english.segment1: Sneakin' round after midnight. There's no one there to see me. Participating on the wrong side. Then I hear a voice in my mind singing
english.segment2: Chorus: When I see you running away. It makes me wanna cry. When I see you. Reminding me of the day I had to die. Don't you know that My heard I still can feel the pain. When I see you, it's killing me again
english.segment3: A Holy King is returning. It could be any time. He's coming back for a spotless bridge. Not for those who've got something they're trying to hide
